translation.WELCOME_MSG: Thank you for contacting Sacramento Three One One. You've used this skill {{counter}} times. What can I help you with?
translation.WELCOME_REPROMPT: How can I help? You can ask me about your garbage pick up day, report an abandoned vehicle, or check your case status.
translation.PERSONALIZED_WELCOME_MSG: Welcome back {{name}}. How can I help you today?
translation.REPORT_ISSUE: Alright. What's the issue you're reporting?
translation.YES_RETRY: Alright, what can I do for you?
translation.NO_RETRY: Understood. Thank you for contacting Sacramento three one one. Goodbye!
translation.HELP_MSG: Welcome to the Sacramento 311 skill! To use the skill, simply say something like, when is my garbage pickup day?, report an abandoned vehicle, or check the status of my case. How can I help?
translation.FALLBACK_MSG: Sorry, I don't know about that. Please try again.
translation.FALLBACK_STILL_MSG: I'm sorry, I'm still having trouble understanding you. Would you like me to transfer you to a live agent?
translation.FALLBACK_STILL_MSG_REPROMPT: Would you like me to transfer you to a live agent?
translation.ERROR_MSG: Sorry, I had trouble doing what you asked. Please try again.
translation.UNKNOWN_MSG: Sorry about that. If you try phrasing your issue differently, I may be able to understand. I'll wait.
translation.UNKNOWN_MSG_REPROMPT: I'm still here. Do you want to try reporting your issue again?
translation.CRITICAL_ERROR_MSG: I'm sorry, something went wrong on our end. Please try again later.
translation.LIVEAGENT_PROBLEM: Sorry, I am having a problem right now.
translation.ANYTHING_ELSE_MSG: I'm sorry about that. Is there anything else I can help you with?
translation.TRASH_THANKS: Thank you for reporting the {{trashType}} trash. We'll dispatch someone to the incident as soon as we can. Is there anything else I can help you with?
translation.ABANDONED_VEHICLE_CONFIRMATION: Just to confirm, are you reporting an abandoned vehicle?
translation.ABANDONED_VEHICLE_THANKS: <speak>Thank you for reporting the abandoned {{color}} {{make}} {{model}} located near {{location}}. Your case number is <say-as interpret-as='digits'>{{caseNumber}}</say-as>. We'll dispatch someone to the incident as soon as we can. Is there anything else I can help you with?</speak>
translation.ABANDONED_VEHICLE_72Q: Has the vehicle been abandoned for more than seventy-two hours?
translation.ABANDONED_VEHICLE_72A: Unfortunately we cannot take action until the vehicle has been abandoned for more than 72 hours. Is there anything else I can help you with?
translation.HOMELESS_CONFIRMATION: Just to confirm, are you reporting about a homeless camp?
translation.HOMELESS_THANKS: Thank you for reporting the {{homelessCamp}} with {{numPeople}} people on {{propertyType}} property at {{location}}. We will dispatch someone to the incident as soon as we can. Is there anything else I can help with?
translation.HOMELESS_THANKS_CONTINUATION: Thank you for reporting the {{homelessCamp}} with {{numPeople}} people on {{propertyType}} property at {{location}}. We will dispatch someone to the incident as soon as we can. We just need a little more information about the trash.
translation.LOCATION_GET_ADDRESS: What is the address of the incident you are reporting?
translation.LOCATION_USE_CURRENT: Do you want to use your current location for the report?
translation.LOCATION_USE_HOME: Would you like us to use your home address as the location for your report?
translation.LOCATION_GEO_ISSUE: There was an issue retrieving your geolocation. Can you please tell me your location?
translation.LOCATION_RETRY_REDIRECT: Apologies, we're having trouble finding your location. Would you like to speak to a live agent?
translation.LOCATION_RETRY: Okay, let's try that again. What's the address?
translation.LOCATION_GET_LOCATION: What's the location? You can give an address or nearest cross street.
translation.CONFIRM_ADDRESS_MSG: I found an address at {{address}}. Is this the correct address?
translation.INACCURATE_GEO_MSG: Geo location is too inaccurate to use. Would you like to try another address?
translation.UNAUTHORIZED_GEO_MSG: Sacramento311 would like to use your current location. To turn on location sharing, please go to your Alexa app, and follow the instructions.
translation.UNAVAILABLE_GEO_MSG: This device is stationary so geoLocation is unavaible. Would you like to use your home address instead?

translation.WELCOME_MSG: Gracias por contactar a Sacramento Three One One. ¿Cómo puedo ayudarte hoy?
